website_summaries.verdict: A less expensive alternative to the Arlo Ultra, the Pro 3 is a great kit that still offers reliable, high-quality features.
pros: Featrues 2K HDR video for reliable footage
The built-in spotlight makes this kit a good option for night vision
cons: The 2-way audio feature is somewhat frustrating to use

website_summaries.verdict: The Arlo Pro 3 has crisp live streaming, fast alerts and a wide range of advanced features that set it apart from other outdoor security cameras. If you have the money to spend, the Arlo Pro 3 should be at the top of your list.
pros: The $500 Arlo Pro 3 comes in a two-camera pack, along with a required hub
Older Arlo hubs work with this system too and add-on individual cams cost $200 each
The Pro 3 has a built-in siren and works with Alexa and Google Assistant
A USB drive in the hub handles local storage
The 2K streaming is stellar (assuming your Wi-Fi connection is solid)
cons: It's expensive, and unlike the Arlo Pro 2 and Ultra cameras, the Arlo Pro 3 doesn't come in a one-pack kit with a hub
So, if you don't have a hub, you have to get the pricey $500 two-pack

customer_reviews.title: CAMERA USELSS WILL NOT RECORD WITHOUT SUBSCRIPTION GRAINY COLOR AT NITE.
customer_reviews.text: WAS NOT CLARIFIED THAT THE ARLO PRO 3 RECORDING FEATURE IS TURNED OFF UNLESS YOU CAN AFFORD A SUBSCRIPTION. DAY COLOR OFF AND NITE COLOR GRAINY. HAVE BEEN ABLE TO SHARE IMAGES WITH SHERIFF DEPARTMENT WITH ARLO PRO 2 THAT THE ARLO PRO 3 MISSED. ARLO AND SELLER OUT OF THIS WORLD ELECTRONICS UNWILLING TO RESOLVE THIS ISSUE. DISAPPOINTED AFTER 15 YEARS TO HAVE TO WRITE A NEGATIVE REVIEW.
customer_reviews.author: DISAPPOINTED

customer_reviews.title: no more 7 days free cloud storage
customer_reviews.text: the system works ok, battery life is below average. The reason for 1 star is that it was not clear at time of purchase that the Arlo Pro 3 no longer supplies 7 days free cloud storage. Starting with the Arlo 3 you need purchase a monthly subscription per camera to store 30 days of video events. That is $2.99 per camera, $36 per year per camera, so basically for the set of 3 cameras, another $100 per year
customer_reviews.author: Tech User

customer_reviews.title: Good video image, poor battery life compared to description.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am happy with the product. It works well. On the other hand, the battery is at 75% after 4 days, using the optimized for the battery setting and lower image quality. I purchased them based on the claim that the battery lasts 4-6 months. Disappointed with the false claim. Night vision works ok, but only if you leave the spotlight feature on, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: I actually quite like the product initially, however my protracted experience with the customer service has been quite possibly the worst customer service I've ever experienced. Now after a firmware update or two the hardware has stopped working. Motion based recordings doesn’t work as intended, I can’t download the recordings in library, and the picture definition is extremely poor(definitely not the 2K that’s advertised). The only consistent thing about Arlo is the poor customer service. If I could give it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Richards

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The Arlo Pro 3 is easily installed. However the Echo Show I purchased along with Alexa could not find my devices. No matter what I tried. On top of that, there was no live feed. What good is a camera that won't show you what is at the front door? It recorded the activity and I could play it back. But I want to know what is going on in real time. I returned the system and the customer rep at Best buy said only the ring cameras show live. I'll check the out
customer_reviews.author: P. Schenck

customer_reviews.title: Arlo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, app is easily navigated, cameras have good quality pictures. System gives peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Arlo Focus is Exclusively on Selling $10/Month Subscription
customer_reviews.text: Setup is a bit clunky and if you want more than 7 days of video (which you would want if you are on vacation, etc.), you have to buy their cloud offering. You can TRY to add storage using USB 2.0, but their own support forums contradict the manual. I tried to attach an SSD drive, but that failed miserably. The call to support was maddening to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Don't order unless you are tech savvy.
customer_reviews.text: Spent 5 hours unsuccessfully trying to get the base to connect with my NetGear 5G Router. Spoke with Arlo tech support, they instructed me to go into my Router and open two "ports". Polite tech but could not instruct me how to accomplish this. I can't comment on the cameras because I could never get the base to connect. I am not tech savvy enough for this item & need a user friendly device. After 5 hours I gave up, boxed it up, sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: dr watts

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for peace of mind after my divorce. The picture quality is amazing during the day and at night. The spotlight is bright too. It was very easy to set up and the magnetic mounts are super strong. I would recommend getting an extra battery as I can tell that the battery life isn’t that long. I’ve had them for 2 weeks and I’m already at 50% battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera System!
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from a competitor Flood Light camera which struggled to stay connected to my wifi and had poor video quality. The phone app is also much better and the time it takes to load the live video is a big step up from my last camera system. If you are looking for great quality video and don't mind the price, this is the camera system for you!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: YOU MUST HAVE A SUBSCRIPTION TO VIEW VIDEOS
customer_reviews.text: This is not evident when you purchase the unit, but it works differently than a Pro2. With a Pro2, the recordings are saved and you can view the last seven days' worth. This is how the Pro3 works when you first get it because there's a trial period, but not clear in the advertising or materials, is that once the trial subscription runs out, you can not review any Pro3 recordings without paying. So, if you spend more money to buy a Pro3 and want the same functionality as a Pro2, you must purchase a subscription. Customer service would not help. Do not buy unless you are prepared to pay a monthly subscription fee.
customer_reviews.author: LCB

customer_reviews.title: Best camera system available
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are worth every penny. The picture quality is extremely good, wider viewing area is great for covering big yards, and the new features (camera siren and spotlight) are fantastic. The new notifications alerts from Arlo Smart are game changers too. No more motion notifications for cars driving by or trees blowing in the wind. Very impressed with the system and set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: D mowfy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: The cameras were super easy to install. Pretty much just popped in the batteries, and plugged in the base station, downloaded the app, and followed the easy instructions, and the cameras pretty much found themselves. I had two cameras running on my phone in less than a half hour. Had them up for two days, I already caught a possum at our side gate, and 10 sec clip even said "Animal"
customer_reviews.author: M. Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: The Arlo products are continually developing with amazing technology. The best part about these products are the ease of instillation and the new products being compatible with the older products. I would rate the Arlo 3 as 5 stars and will continue to buy more of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby S.

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Arlo Pro 3 no longer features Smartthings integration and uses a propritary charger (rather than the old usb-c). Both of these facts mean I will no longer buy anything from Arlo.
customer_reviews.author: John J. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Clear reliable security
customer_reviews.text: I just installed two Arlo Pro 3 camerason my house last week and love them! The battery life is impressive. I charged them fully and one week later the charge is still almost 100%. I’ve watched workers on my property with such clarity. Easy to install. One problem I had was installing the magnetic base on my brick garage. The screw for the base isn’t for masonry and a masonry screw wouldn’t fit into the Arlo base so I used a masonry anchor and it worked fine. Love my Arlo Pro 3 and have purchased the door bell too.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITHOUT SUBSCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: I am livid. I have used Arlo cameras for a while, have 3 Arlo Pro cameras and added a new Arlo Pro 3 when they were released. My other cameras work without a service plan, WELL the free trial of the plan for my new camera just expired and it is now useless. If you do not pay for a service plan you can ONLY use the camera to view live footage. Meanwhile, my older cameras store footage for 7 days. Totally a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Arlo 2 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that I am writing this while comparing the Arlo 3 to the Arlo 2. The video quality on the 3 is not as good as the 2 in my opinion. I put the 3 and the 2 right next to each other and the 2 has much better quality. The 3 is bitmapped.
customer_reviews.author: Fred G.

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The delay is terrible. On the Live, I can see the starting point but the recording (alert) is a big delay. Therefore, no need for 2-way speaking because alert too late. 1 of the cameras kept going off-line, never could get either of 2 camera to record more than 45 seconds, when only options are 120 seconds or up to 300 (until activity stops) . The sign in app keeps timing out. When I use on Windows 10 (computer), need to install latest version of Adobe Flash Player (which I already have & is not blocked) . Liked the spotlight feature. Tested with the Siren. Returned after a week, junk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Niter

customer_reviews.title: Need to work out software bugs
customer_reviews.text: Cameras worked good until the first time I recharged the batteries. Now they don't detect anything. After being on the phone over an hour I was told it is a software problem & someone would contact me in 3-7 business days.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Pearman

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE support
customer_reviews.text: the product works mediocre. the "smart" notification that should be able to differentiate a vehicle from a person does not work. it sends a notification every time a car goes by, which makes notifications useless. their support is the worst i have ever experienced with any company. the first time i called i was the 9th caller in line, and waited 55 minutes for an answer, then spent 30 minutes with a promise that an email later that day would solve my problem. the problem was never solved, and they never emailed me back. the next time i called i was the 18th called in line and gave up and decided to send the product back.
customer_reviews.author: Scalowags

customer_reviews.title: Does not record consistently
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised by this Arlo product. I have been using their product for years, and really liked it historically. Now the competition is catching up and this product may have been hurried. I have three Arlo Pro 3 cameras, and two of the cameras periodically will not record. Very concerning. Tech Support has not been able to resolve. I have contacted them 3x. They are nice, but no resolution. I returned this product and purchased Nest Cam, which is much more reliable. Again, I wanted to love this, paid a lot of money for past Arlo (have 8 in total), but Arlo is getting beat by the competition and by better reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley25

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Installation of these cameras was a lot easier than I expected. I am considering getting the solar panel charger as well, which looks like a neat addition.
customer_reviews.author: Max C. B. Dyckhoff

customer_reviews.title: Pro 2 is better
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was an upgrade to arlo pro 2, but no. Cannot disable led light from coming on with phone, but desktop is ok. Too expensive compared to pro 2. Magnetic power cable proprietary and cost way more than usb micro. Even solar panel is more expensive. Night vision is NOT in color. Poor quality even in 2k streaming at night. Cannot tone down color saturation. LED flood and infrared lights fall off at 10 feet and are useless at night at a distance. Zoom feature is nice to have but clarity is bad. Stick with Arlo Pro 2. But I suggest a 4K camera for longer shots. And PTZ for wide angles.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Eadeh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA FOR THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Was shopping online for a wireless home security cameras, after researching, and reading online reviews, I decided on the Arlo Pro 3. Setup was relatively easy, after downloading the app, you get step by step instructions. If you decide to purchase this unit make sure you have high speed internet. The best features of the unit is the zoom capabilities, as well as the spotlight, and abilities to talk through the camera, as well as the abilities to add more cameras if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathym

customer_reviews.title: Best Security system I have had
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are great. They have a spot light so it does not matter where you put them. I have them at the beginning of my driveway and throughout our acreage. I have a Netgear Nighthawk router and the reception is great. I was able to put my older Arlo Cameras on the same base. Making a total of 9 cameras. Picture is clear night and day. Videos can be zoomed to see additional details.
customer_reviews.author: LightandSalt

customer_reviews.title: Arlo Pro 3 is better than 2 Pro 2's!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to replace two old cameras with one Arlo Pro 3! The wide view plus 2k video turned out to be better than two of my old cameras mounted next to each other. Not only can I get that entire view with a single camera with uninterrupted video, I can direct connect to the Arlo Pro 3 when on my home network. Extremely good video quality both day and night plus the additional AI for granular notifications make it the perfect camera. I am a huge fan and couldn't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Best camera system
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Arlo cameras and hub and was pretty impressed with them, of course that was 5 years ago. Arlo has improved everything in this version to make them perfect, much, much longer battery life, bigger image, more option to record and download videos. They are a little pricier, but worth it. Also the new Hub supports 6 cameras as before it was only 5.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando J. Diban

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, but camera lags
customer_reviews.text: I set up the activity zones as suggested by the company, but they still lag. They either catch the person as they are walking away or animal that is already at the door. It does not show them approaching. What good is seeing the back of someone’s head as they are leaving? I was told it might be my internet, but after upgrading to 300 mbps I am still having the same issue. Would not recommend. Save yourself the money, invest in a Ring and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: briana

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast, smooth.
customer_reviews.text: The whole set-up process was very easy when compared to my Nest system. Besides being wireless cameras,.. the App set-up and connectivity to my home's network (adding the cameras and a second user with admin privileges) was refreshingly smooth. On Iphone7 - It happily takes about 2-seconds from the moment I click app icon to get the live camera feed up... Notifications upon movement are instantaneous as-well. The color night-vision/ low light ability is super nice. Overall we are very happy. I already knew the video quality was going to be top-tier, but what I really like is its fast...Battery and magnetic case are powerful/ strong. It connects smooth and simple just like it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Digitalmayor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set I up but this package is over priced
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy set up, was up and running in a few minutes sans mounting the cameras outdoors....and there’s the rub! My 3 camera kit had 2 magnetic indoor bases and 1 outdoor mount. I needed 3 outdoor mounts. I googled around and discovered that different retailers get different kits. I found the same system with 2 indoor bases and 4 outdoor bases from another retailer for less money. If this version serves your needs great. But if you need additional bases, shop around.
customer_reviews.author: vaporgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed two cameras in half an hour. Everything included except the ladder and drill to put on exterior stucco. Good clarity. Quick response. Very comforting to see vehicles and people outside. High winds can interfere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subscription required..... Pass
customer_reviews.text: There is no free cloud support any longer. My trial just ran out and can no longer access cameras unless it’s a live view. If I could return them I would. All the older models have it included for free. Do not buy unless you plan getting a subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McGarrity

customer_reviews.title: really buggy software
customer_reviews.text: Settings won't stay set. Night vision is limited to about 3 feet.. My $25 camera sees so much more. Very laggy. My $25 camera has no lag. Sometimes I get notifications, but the videos never show up in the library. Subscription is $10 per month, way too much for problems that never get fixed. I had a good strong signal at both cameras. My WIFI plenty fast. I have returned the product. Over priced accessories.... goes on and on.
customer_reviews.author: eTech

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or effort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two Arlo Pro 3 cameras and was extremely disappointed. I have two Nest Cam Outdoor and they are hands down, far superior to Arlo. Compared them both side by side. Night vision is not very good on Arlo. Batteries are pitiful and require backup sets charging constantly and camera access where you can change batteries frequently. (Frequent being every couple of days- at most! If they are not on at night or continuously) Camera system far more expensive than my nest cams. Didn't want Nest because of subscription cost, but that has now been adjusted to being reasonable. Arlo Cams are highly over-rated and expensive, but the battery idea is awesome and is really what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: BeerAbs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cameras
customer_reviews.text: Did a bunch of research before buying this a camera, ended up with a great product. The cameras are small and light. They hold a charge well, although will probably have to recharge them every 3 months or so. I've considered hooking them up to cables, but didn't have a problem finding spots that are easy enough to reach for that not to be necessary. There was a little learning curve to setting the cameras up right. It's good to use the setup assistant to define the area you want to cover and to play around with the sensitivity setting to get to a balance that triggers the right amount of notifications.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Once you buy this... you’re going to want more Arlo security!
customer_reviews.text: BEST wireless security system!!!! Look, people are going to never be happy, but as a Virgo who is a picky researcher, TRUST me when I tell you this system is amazing!!! If you’re a single woman, get this AND Arlo’s doorbell. I have an ex who can’t take the hint... should he show up again, it records everything- both visual and audio. I’m looking into getting the Arlo spotlight camera next for my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: N. Petrauskas

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to installing and using these cameras. For the most part they worked as advertised, however: 1. IMPORTANT, smart features don't work in every country. This weird thing is buried in fine print so beware and check if the services work where you live. 2. Video quality SUCKS!, nevermind its 2k, the video quality is bad especially at night. Forget recognizing faces or license plates at night. I checked and all settings and requirements are met, its just the way the video encoding (or whatever) works with the streaming video. For the price, if you are expecting high-quality video look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Soto Vilaplana

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS SYSTEM!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a camera system that will function without a monthly subscription fee this is not the system for you. Arlo locks simple features that are available on cheaper system behind a pay wall. Once your "trial" runs out only one person can access locally stored video clips and there are no thumbnails to give you an idea of what you're downloading before you download it. The camera system is great but because Arlo is trying to cash in on a subscription fee for basic features I'm only giving this one star. Save your money and buy a cheaper system with no subscription fees for less $
customer_reviews.author: Wraith3845

customer_reviews.title: The audio is excellent.  Night vision is much better
customer_reviews.text: I love these cameras. I went from the Arlo straight to the 3 and the difference is night and day. They are bigger but they do more. The transition from my old Arlo cameras to the 3 was super easy. The only thing I don't like about the base station is it doesn't give you a LAN indicator like the old one did. But that is minor compared to everything it does well. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from Arlo Pro
customer_reviews.text: I needed to install a third camera to my Arlo Pro system. The Pro 3 is a huge upgrade over the pro. I like that this model to distinguish between people, animals, cars, and lets you hide notifications for a category of them. I do not like that with my Arlo Pro system I had 7 days on cloud recordings for free but on this new camera, I have to pay for service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Oates

customer_reviews.title: Camera Needs a Way to Reset
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded my Arlo Pro system to the SmartHub so I can add Arlo Pro 3 cameras. I have one Pro 3 in my utility room to monitor the sump pump. It keeps disconnecting. I bring the camera in close range to the hub but it won't reconnect. So I delete the device and reconnect after much effort of pushing the sync button method. I moved the SmartHub so it is more central and very close to my utility room. It disconnects again. Now it won't reconnect no matter what I do. There should be a factory reset method as this camera is now useless and junk now.
customer_reviews.author: United States of Alaska

customer_reviews.title: 110v only !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and couldn't turn it on Because electricity is only 110 volts Does the manufacturer think that the world has one electricity current? Amazon is a global marketplace that everyone buys from, and the manufacturer must take this into account I will have to buy another power adapter and wait several days for it to arrive in my country
customer_reviews.author: fars

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra $.
customer_reviews.text: Image quality at night no better than the less expensive model. We purchased this to add to our existing Arlo setup after someone tried to break into our cars and the Arlo Pro 2 only captured grainy shots. The Pro 3 wasn’t much better and frequently get pixilated motion capture. It was not worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Deb F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Security
customer_reviews.text: Cameras and base station are easy to install and set up. The optional solar panels are the way to go. Especially if you are mounting the cameras in a spot that will be difficult to get to. The app works great and the notification and alerts are easy to manage once you navigate your way thru all of the options.
customer_reviews.author: snakebyte71

customer_reviews.title: Supposedly the best but I totally disagree
customer_reviews.text: You must subscribe to the Arlo cloud for recordings if you hook up a hard drive to it you have to download the video to your phone which with its limited memory and poses all kinds of problems and there doesn't seem to be any way of accessing videos from a desktop computer. total waste of money as far as I'm concerned. Arlo shouldn't advertise that you can hook a hard drive and view it because they make it as extremely inconvenient as possible to use an external hard drive I would not recommend this product if you want easy access without paying for cloud services.
customer_reviews.author: Sweep993

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing for $900
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/27/20: I frequently need to restart the hub. Cameras regularly go offline for no reason. Battery life is very poor. Do not buy this product. Spend the extra money and get a reliable system or wait until you can afford one. This is a poor product with poor support. Batteries need to be charged every 2 or 3 days. App is awful. About a 5 second delay for live audio/video makes 2 way communication impossible. Range from hub and video quality is good. That got it 2 stars. Most features unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Alison B

customer_reviews.title: works well day and night
customer_reviews.text: cameras are more inconspicuous than I'd worried about, they blend right in to the lights etc around the house. Cameras function well and the smart system is nice. When I test it out I'll get an alert immediately and then a bit later the recording and a flag which is a best guess of the category of event. Positioning the camera is quite easy - the alignment mode has a delay of around 5 seconds to view in the phone app but after a few iterations all is fine
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cameras!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a busy neighborhood and heard some sounds around the house at night, after moving in. Concerned that someone was poking around outside my kid's bedroom I put up a few cameras so I could see what was happening. I love that the Pro 3 had the sensor lights built in and the next night when I heard the noise again I went on my phone and saw it was just a neighborhood cat taking a midnight stroll! I worry a little less when I hear sounds now, knowing I can see what's happening without getting out of bed. Plus... my kids now love seeing what the cats are up to.
customer_reviews.author: Easypeasy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Arles decision regarding local storage viewing for family members
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in video capture. Has capability for $0.00 customer costs. But Arlo has decided profit more important than customer satisfaction. Sure, with Arlo 3 camera and compatible SmartHub you can record at $0.00 costs. That’s customer value. But only one account can view the video library. Therefore, your spouse or children, even if youngest library access, cannot view recorded video. You will have to pay an additional ~$120 year for everyone else in the family to have access to the library video. Sadly, the technical capability exists for Arlo to allow customers the ability for all family members to view local storage. But Arlo has decided to disable the capability forcing customers to pay the monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality footage, overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the quality of these cameras, the ease of setup, and the ability to utilize local storage. The magnetic holder is quite convenient, however unfortunately I was unable to utilize it as my cameras were purchased for outside use and at a height that someone could easily grab/steal the camera if they wanted. A catch-22 with the batteries also - you want the camera in a location you can access it somewhat easily, but also need it to be out of reach to prevent theft. Overall I’m quite satisfied with my purchase, and look forward to adding more cameras to my system.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis K. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR TECH SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as advertised. Nuisance motion tripping due to failing activity zones even though I had the Arlo Smart subscription. Spent 4+ weeks dealing with tech support only to be told every time that they need to escalate it to a higher tech support group. Then expect a 24-48 hour turn around for a response. But never came. Then rescalate it again and begin the endless cycle. I have records of every communication. Because the return date passed now I'm stuck with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Very very slow response. You’ll get a motion alert several minutes after an actual event has occurred. If you want to see what’s happening on a camera, connecting to a camera takes a long time. By the time you log in and connect to the camera it’s too late, it takes about a minute. My advice look this up before buying, google why Arlo cameras are no good and you’ll find a ton of facts that I’ve just now come to realize. I’m returning my pro 3’s ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalp5

customer_reviews.title: Worked well after setup.
customer_reviews.text: Just got them all set up. I’ve had several camera systems. Once operational the quality and design seemed good. The setup didn’t work very well. The mobile app is quite average unless you just take defaults. I tried to rename my cameras and when I chose for instance, camera 3, it renamed camera 1. The setup didn’t find the devices normally. I had to use trickery more than once. I took batteries out of the working cameras so I could add a camera. The app also gives you options like two factor authentication but then you must select it or it won’t install.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: Arlo Pro 3- Very Easy to install system cameras. Software setup simple. Video Quality is Excellent! Flexible setup options. Worth the Investment.
customer_reviews.author: William Schaub

customer_reviews.title: good, But Not great
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my camera system from Arlo Pro 2 to Pro 3 system. main reason to make that decision was that improved quality of video and added features to the cameras. however there are many things that needs improvement. - Signal Quality (from Base Station to the Cameras is always spotty and lags. - Night Vision ( Night vision needs improvement and the clarity of the images) - price (Not worth the price tag.) - Accessories (very expensive accessories)
customer_reviews.author: Harshan Perera

customer_reviews.title: Safe home even when not home
customer_reviews.text: I get notifications about my home wherever I might be at the time. Why only 4 stars? Well it does such an amazing job that when the wind blows it states action in it's vision. The location grid selector doesn't respond to what area you have selected. It even detects movement (3 Saints) inside the house. That said if you need full coverage this is the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Local Storage challenging
customer_reviews.text: Local storage not very straightforward, which is a very important part of a camera system . After formatting an external HD via the Arlo Base (to make it compatible with Arlo base for recording) it was no longer compatible with windows if we plugged into a laptop to try to view the recordings, Windows wouldn’t even recognize the device plugged in. We found a workaround which is a little inconvenient and technical, but were expecting this to be a little more direct. Called Arlo Tech Support, they weren’t helpful, said They would get back to us but never did
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service ever, and really does not work without an expensive subscription
customer_reviews.text: Am really upset at spending the $$$$$ on a complete sstem with 6 cameras and one floodlight and only to discover that without the subscription the recordings do not work at all. Spent over 15 hours trying to fix the issue, and then a few more hours with their tech support .. and in the end they say yea you should just get the subscription and then get it to work remotely. I am not one to leave reviews and esp bad ones, but this to me was an expensive expensive selling something that is not what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.author: Mahipal Lunia

customer_reviews.title: Full-time RV camping- Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our RV for fulltime camping and it works perfect for us. We are still dialing everything in but I love being able to just check in and see what is going on around us without getting up out of bed. The aciticiry zone settings work great too when I don’t want all the coverage (street activity) and only want to see what is going on with our camp site.
customer_reviews.author: R. Craig

customer_reviews.title: The batteries last 10 days Not 6 months!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this arlo 3 cameras supposedly one of the best surveillance system today but since a month i charged the batteries 3 times already!!!!!! The customer support said lower the definition and the audio and ... so you paid for a 2K definition 6 months batteries life proudly annonced by the marketing but it clearly doesn't work. I'm beyond disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.author: AZ38

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive and worst camera I ever bought. Customer service is a joke. Stops recording and they denied any claim after dragging it out till the return period expired. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: R. Schweinfurter

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Crap
customer_reviews.text: These cameras were like $600+ and absolute crap. Bought them as a security system and it fails to do that. Its cool to see the live feed but I'm more interested in it catching motion or things going around my house. They never seem to catch the cars parking in front of my house, but will turn on for the leaves or the branches moving of our tree... or the spider web string that blows in front of it. I don't want to get started with the tech support or the server outages that seem to happen all the time. This product is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Edrington

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about the product. The clip on the base broke as I was taking the camera down to recharge. Only had it for about 2 months. Thankfully I purchase the extended coverage as Best Buy the 3rd party supplier would not honor the defect after 30 days. I’m the process of getting a replacement. Will let you know if I have any issues. For the amount of money I paid I should not have to pay monthly service to save to the cloud. What’s the point of having the camera if I can’t go back to look a footage. It provides good coverage of my home with small delays.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Arlo pro 3 cams and the door bell with video. The only difficult part was syncing the camera up via Bluetooth, I completed this task by syncing it through Arlo hub that can with the cameras I purchased. Very easy system to set up and use. Very clear pictures. I will likely expand my system with more Arlo products. I have one cam mounted outside the house, and after a month and a half it is at 50%. I would suggest hardwiring cams out side or further away from the hub.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Hamil

customer_reviews.title: Problem  with theft
customer_reviews.text: Need to make it harder for people to steal had all 4 cameras stolen off the house
customer_reviews.author: dan williams

customer_reviews.title: Did a lot of research before buying this product
customer_reviews.text: There's a 4 second lag , but for a wireless camera linked to a hub, that is linked to a power line for PoE to my router on the other side of the house, it is manageable. The recordings are very clear and I have 3 months of the service which is good to see how much you like it. My only issue is you cannot log in to more than one device, so my mother cannot have her phone logged in and my home computer logged in as well. Otherwise so far a good investment
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Meh 😒
customer_reviews.text: Daytime clarity is dramatically improved from earlier versions. Night vision is no different. I had an issue with the spotlight thats new... couldn’t get it to shut off. I have also been having issues with the cameras disconnecting. Also. 2 cameras came with 2 different mounts. 2 magnetic mounts would have been nice. Had to order other mounts as I couldn’t screw into my wall. Overall... not very happy with the purchase... but what can I do at this point. 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I thought the promises of this product were too good to be true...I was WRONG. 6 camera + 1 door bell and the system works flawlessly with after market solar panels. Would recommend to any home owner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: After having my car broken into in my driveway, I decided it was time for these. So far I am satisfied with them even though I haven't had any crime reason for them. They have good picture quality and decent motion detection. They are an expensive way to monitor the pets as they traverse the property, but if that is all I ever need them for, I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Good safety camera
customer_reviews.text: good video quality and nice to have two-way mic/speaker built into the camera. Wish the motion detection can work a little bit better and the spot light can be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng-Tao Chen

customer_reviews.title: Arlo Pro 3 😖
customer_reviews.text: Night vision is horrible can’t see anything maybe if there was a security light I might be able to see something. Every time we change the battery have had to call technical support is mess up on ur phone have to reinstall cameras, complete pain!!! Wish I’d returned them Don’t recommended Day vision is fine. app stinks not very User-friendly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Very expensive and for some odd reason that is unmentioned, monthly cloud fees of minimum 9.99 while the arlo 1 and 2 have no cloud fees. Arlo messed up while competitors are half the price and free cloud access. Ohh and btw, you can't buy storage unless you are from certain locations, search well before you consider. My pack of three were used to set a bon fire and replace with Amazon blink can which are amazing
customer_reviews.author: naser

customer_reviews.title: No subscription no access to video recordings!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in Arlo pro 3, do NOT buy unless you are planning on paying the monthly fee to be able to store video in the cloud. If you dont subscribe, the cameras will be practically useless since it wont record at all. Your only option will be to attach a USB to the arlo tower subsequently only being able to view the videos once you insert that same USB on your PC or LAPTOP. WHICH TOTALLY DEFEATS THE PURPOSE OF THE CAMERAS
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras
customer_reviews.text: We selected Arlo Pro 3 cameras, a solar panel and paired them with the Arlo video doorbell. All components installed easily and work flawlessly! The app on the phone provides near instant video and audio feed when the cameras are motion activated. The built in light allows clear video at night as well! Very happy with our Arlo Pro 3 system!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Baker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the system for 3 months with contacting Arlo tech support 3 times with problems . No solution from Arlo except them saying, maybe contact Amazon. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS SYSTEM!! Money down the toliet.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Setup was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: We finally pulled the trigger in getting some security cameras for our house. The Arlo cameras were recommended to us. We researched these along with a few other systems, and determined that these were the best. I was pleasantly surprised how fast and east is was to set up the system. The Arlo app is easy to use too. We are still playing around with the settings, but overall we are happy with the system.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Reier

customer_reviews.title: So Far I am Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Nest cameras for years inside my house. I was looking to expand my coverage to the outside of my house. The Arlo system appealed to me because I didn’t need to run any wires to the cameras. Set up was simple and the system is performing very well. The quality of the cameras is great and I’m really enjoying the new system.
customer_reviews.author: M Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Delayed notifications
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maximus security light in the front of my home and it absolutely blows away the Arlo. Maximus is almost instantaneous and the Arlo has a delay that ranges from 40 seconds to 1 1/2 minutes. It honestly is not a good system. It is 10 dollars a month and the Maximus is 60 bucks for the year. I should her bought Maximus flood lamps instead of this junk. My shed could be broken into and robbed before I would get an alert. My home could be broken into while I am sleeping and I could potentially have a home intruder before I would get an alert. Buy Maximus not Arlo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge step down from Pro 2
customer_reviews.text: Added this to a Pro 2 setup. Pro 3 has terrible wifi reception, terrible battery life (even on lowest quality), didn't always detect motion... and worst of all you are now expected to pay an annual subscription. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three of these. They work great alerting to movement by person, car or animal. We are waiting for the newer version to become available so we can add it to our system.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Nice cameras, and easy set up and installation!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, just not sure how to record to my own cloud service once free trial is up. I guess just use a usb until then... picture quality is okay, can’t make up great details 50+ feet away but still like that it picks up motion easily and can decipher cars people and animals.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: It's giving me peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I 'm only using one camera at the present point in time. Unable to find someone to install 2nd one. The information I've been receiving has been eye opening and I've made adjustments to my property to deter people from coming through my yard constantly. Hopefully I'll have grass again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile cameras yet!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the original Arlo. I love the versatility of these cameras. Charge the batteries or plug the camera in. 2k clear picture and video even at night. Also love the spotlight feature. The speaker capability is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty N.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as Butter!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not tech savvy and I’m not that great at reading directions. But geesh is the Arlo camera easy to set up! I was so giddy when I got the cameras working. Whoever designed the Arlo Pro 3 has achieved quite an impressive feat - having instructions and tutorials that are accurate and easy to follow. I added an Echo Show, and now I’m having to fight not buying more cameras now that I know how easy they are to set up! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overview
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality product, you get what you pay for. I love the instant access, sometimes its a bit slow to connect but I think that's because I'm not connected to wifi when I'm checking. One thing I haven't figured out is how to do the audio, every time I hit the microphone button my app freezes so I still need to figure that part out but it doesn't change my review.
customer_reviews.author: LiviaBeavis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Delay
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are nice except the delay makes them completely useless. From my phone it takes roughly 30 seconds to open and go “live” with a 4 second delay. With my Amazon Echo Show 10 it takes about 15 seconds to go “live” but there is always at least a 14 second delay. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our home security. Super easy to install using included magnetic mounts. They provide good view, clear images. Very easy to add to Alexia and work great with Alexa Show. I purchased the 30 foot charging cables and have the cameras charging 24x7.
customer_reviews.author: LLR

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, great piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few Foscam cameras in addition to the new Arlo. The Arlo system is much easier to set up. Notifications are excellent. Cloud options along with USB storage at the hub is much better in comparison. I'll likely switch out my other cameras and utilize the geo fencing on the internal ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Got them for family they like them we also have and we like them also. They are amazing everything works greatI have the arlo first ones that came out then the pro 2 those are also good, but the Pro 3 works great love everything about it , even bought A set for my Niece and her family!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Arlo Pro 3 system
customer_reviews.text: We love our Arlo system! We have been very impressed with the video & audio quality our cameras have. Video quality is clear and precise and you can hear sounds clearly! Would definitely recommend this system. This is our first camera system and we couldn’t be happier! My parents have an older Arlo system and even they are impressed with the Pro 3 quality.
customer_reviews.author: AK127

customer_reviews.title: Go with a different brand
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a lower rating I would - I have spent a lot of money on the Arlo camera system and it works with great inconsistencies. This camera in particular is now unusable after just 6 months - the battery lasts less than a day even when it’s not being triggered
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Frequently goes offline and presently is "stuck" offline.
customer_reviews.text: Tech support was not helpful as of this writing (8/2/20). Arlo was "pushing" monthly subscription plan and frequently reminded you once system was up and running. It does not seem coincidental that the offline status occurred around the time the Arlo subscription offer expired. There is no mention that this system required a monthly subscription to continue functioning.
customer_reviews.author: WDunn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you are going to pay the monthly fee for Smart Arlo
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed to have the ability to view local recordings from the app. This feature only works about 50% of the time. If you look at Alro's support site there are multiple threads about this issue with no solution. I would recommend the Pro 2 over this model because it comes with 7 days of free cloud storage. This model comes with a free trial of Arlo Smart. The trial was just long enough that I couldn't return the system when it ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Drops connection frequently. Goes offline almost daily. None of my other camera brands do this.
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple top level brands of security cameras currently active. These are the only ones that go offline for no reason, show as unavailable or are simply hit or miss when you want to view them. I am canceling my subscription because there is no point paying for continuous recording when it drops unexpectedly almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: BTB

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted 3 days at lowest settings
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Image quality looked GREAT.... when it worked. Didn't always catch motion when I needed it to. But would record the slightest breeze at night. Returned after 4 days!
customer_reviews.author: Austin, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up. App walks you thru it. I had a small glitch and customer service was very helpful and patient. The images are very clear. It even picked up wind movement! It has been a pain free experience so far. And I have satellite internet yet they are still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Loree Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and found it to be of good quality, easy to install, easy to use, the video quality is excellent and it has served its purpose well. My only issue would be that as easy as the app is to use for the product, it doesn’t come with an owners manual, so you have to figure things out and what they mean on your own. An small owners manual would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Rebello

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UPGRADE!
customer_reviews.text: We got this system to upgrade our current setup of Pro 2's. Super happy with the range & clarity of the Pro 3's! Definitely worth the upgrade! We love Arlo for the piece of mind we get in knowing we can see our home when we are not there! OH... and the geofencing feature is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to install, set up and use. I love it even though I’m still learning about its features. At night time, you can still appreciate some good visibility. It records movements and send you quick notifications and voice comes out very clear. Love how easy is to remove, charge and place back.
customer_reviews.author: Kayladi
